00152         #define SAFE_DELETE(x) if(x) delete x; x=NULL;
00153 #endif
00154 
00155 #if !defined(SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY)
00156         #define SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(x) if (x) delete [] x; x=NULL;
